summary:
The power of the \"Unrelenting Force\" shout in a Sword, Bow, Warhammer, Mace, and Dagger!
Burns targets as an added bonus!
descriptionHtml:
The power of the \"Unrelenting Force\" shout in a Sword, Bow, Warhammer, Mace, and Dagger!
Burns targets as an added bonus!

Located in the Whiterun Jarl\'s Quarters. 

All weapons can be improved and disenchanted, and they do 5 points of fire damage.
Executions were causing immortality problems, so the effect does not occur when executing opponents.

Didn\'t know if this classified as a cheat.  Let me know if it does.
author: TittyKitty
